name: Loglikelihood F1 Test Suite
description: Comprehensive test cases for loglikelihood_f1 metric covering various scenarios including different logprob distributions, correct/incorrect predictions, and edge cases. This is a corpus-level F1 score metric.

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - Perfect Predictions

doc.query: What is the capital of France?

test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with perfect predictions across corpus

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - All Incorrect Predictions

doc.query: What is the largest planet in our solar system?

test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with all incorrect predictions across corpus

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - Mixed Predictions
test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with mixed predictions (some correct, some incorrect)

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - Very Confident Correct

doc.query: What is the chemical symbol for gold?

test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with very confident correct prediction

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - Very Confident Incorrect

doc.query: What year did World War II end?

test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with very confident incorrect prediction

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - Close Probabilities

doc.query: What is the speed of light?

test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with close probabilities but wrong choice highest

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - Negative Logprobs

doc.query: How many sides does a hexagon have?

test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with negative logprobs (correct choice highest)

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - All Negative Logprobs

doc.query: What is the main theme of 1984?

test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with all negative logprobs (correct choice highest)

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - Single Choice
test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with single choice (trivial case)

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - Multiple Gold Indices
test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with multiple correct answers (first correct answer highest)

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - Multiple Gold Indices Wrong
test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with multiple correct answers but wrong choice highest

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - Zero Probabilities

doc.query: What is the capital of Japan?

test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with zero probabilities (first choice wins by default)

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - Very Small Differences
test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with very small differences in probabilities

test_cases.name: Loglikelihood F1 - Balanced Predictions

doc.query: What is the square root of 16?

test_cases.description: Test loglikelihood F1 with balanced predictions (correct choice has highest probability)
